alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:52AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...CORRECTED TO CHANGE THE WHEN TIME FRAMES... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow today. Additional accumulations of 3 to 8 inches below 6500 feet, and 8 to 15 inches above 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph, creating low visibility...including localized whiteout conditions. * WHERE...Victor, Ashton, Tetonia, Driggs, Raynolds Pass, Targhee Pass, and Island Park. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially today. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley
